attributes.action: stop the sudden closure of newham general chemo unit.
attributes.additional_details:
The chemo unit was suddenly closed in april 2013 with no explanation apart from staff sickness.
We need this unit open asap it is easy accessable the staff are friendly and helpful and calming  in times of great stress to patients..
Patients with low immune systems are having to travel to central london with limited access...
Patient care is now failing due to the closure ...
We the patients/carers deserve the right to a choice or a feasable explanation as to why this unit was closed after only a few months of moving to bigger facilities to accommodate the amount of patients needing treatment.
